amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike Sec. 203, which relates to the prohibition on restraining orders, preliminary injunctions, and injunctions pending appeals and to strike Title III, which relates to the imposition of a bond requirement as part of a potential legal challenge of certain forest management activities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 1 printed in part C of House Report 114-192 to strike Sec. 203, relating to the prohibition on restraining orders, preliminary injunctions, and injunctions pending appeals and to strike Title III, relating to the imposition of a bond requirement as part of a potential legal challenge of certain forest management activities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 247 (Roll no. 427).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 247 (Roll no. 427).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Polis.
